/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the serene atmosphere of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image appears to have been taken during the day, as indicated by the bright and clear lighting.
